body.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Welcome to Open Hardware Month! ","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"We want to see your ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://application.oshwa.org/"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"certifications","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"text","value":"! Starting this year any certifications during October will be Pumpkin Spiced and thus get you a special OHM sticker as well as a special shout out on socials. Certification is the number one way to guarantee that your work is fully open source and it will be added to our database of projects so it is easily accessible to anyone who wants to see it, make it, and iterate on it. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"We are excited to see what designs you’ve all been working on and we’re especially excited to see them certified!","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}
